replies.author: fanglys
replies.txt_content:
@echo OFF
java -Xms1g -Xmx2g -jar craftbukkit-1.7.2-R0.3.jar
pause

craftbukkit-1.7.2-R0.3.jar改成你目录下服务端的名称~
